title: 'I have some gas left in the tank': At 37, Djokovic still has big tennis goals
description: Djokovic has had a rough start to 2025, but shown flashes of brilliance too. And he's aiming for that 100th tour win.
author: Simon Cambers

title: Swiatek into Madrid quarters; No. 1 Zverev loses
description: Iga Swiatek advanced to the quarterfinals of the Madrid Open after a "more relaxed" day following a blackout while top-seeded Alexander Zverev was upset by Francisco Cerundolo.

title: Unlock the Perfect Slice Serve - Essential Tennis Podcast #415
description: The wide slice serve is a CRITICAL tool to have in your tool box. It pulls opponents out of position, opens the court up for you to hit into, exposes their usually weaker backhand side, and forces them to run twice as far for the next shot - if they even get it at all. Let’s take a deep dive into how YOU can develop this powerful weapon, step by step in this special episode of the Essential Tennis Podcast.
author: Essential Tennis LLC

title: 3 Djokovic Secrets To Winning More Matches - Essential Tennis Podcast #414
description: In this special episode of the Essential Tennis Podcast, you're going to learn the top 3 tactical secrets of Novak Djokovic that you can apply in your very next match. Use these tools to gain precision, consistency, and offense to make your opponents more uncomfortable, win more points, and win more matches.
author: Essential Tennis LLC

title: Out-of-form Djokovic withdraws from Italian Open
description: Novak Djokovic will not take part in the Italian Open next week in another blow to the 24-time Grand Slam winner's preparations for Roland Garros.

title: Draper advances in Madrid as matches resume
description: Jack Draper reaches the round of 16 at the Madrid Open after opponent Matteo Berrettini retires injured as play resumes following a power cut.

title: 'Remember when tennis was easy?' Bublik laments Mensik's talent to chair umpire
description: Can someone please take Alexander Bublik back to the good old days? The Kazakhstani delivered indirect praise of Jakub Mensik in typically humorous fashion on Tuesday during a conversation with chair umpire Mohamed Lahyani at the Mutua Madrid Open. During his fourth-round match against Mensik, which the #NextGenATP Czech ultimately won 6-3, 6-2, Bublik turned to Lahyani during a changeover. “Mohamed, remember when tennis was easy? Like five years ago it was super easy to play tennis,” said the four-time ATP Tour champion Bublik. “A bunch of random people in the Top 50, barely moving. Now this guy is not even Top 5, not even Top 10. What is that?” Tuesday’s straight-sets victory at the ATP Masters 1000 in Madrid was the latest impressive performance in a breakout 2025 for Mensik. The 19-year-old defeated Novak Djokovic to lift his maiden tour-level title in March in Miami, and he is now up to No. 20 in the PIF ATP Live Rankings. If you ask Bublik, he should already be in the Top 10 at the very least. [NEWSLETTER FORM]

title: What is the Madrid tennis schedule?
description: The Mutua Madrid Open continues on Wednesday, when Indian Wells champion Jack Draper faces 11th seed Tommy Paul and sixth seed Alex de Minaur closes the day against 10th seed Lorenzo Musetti. De Minaur is aiming to avenge his Monte-Carlo semi-final loss to Musetti earlier this month. The Italian won in a deciding-set tie-break, improving to 2-1 in their Lexus ATP Head2Head series. Draper and Paul will clash for a sixth time on Manolo Santana Stadium. Frances Tiafoe faces Matteo Arnaldi, who upset Novak Djokovic in the second round. Grigor Dimitrov faces lucky loser Gabriel Diallo. View Wednesday's full order of play below. ORDER OF PLAY - WEDNESDAY, 30 APRIL 2025 Manolo Santana Stadium - start 1:00 PM WTA - [5] Madison Keys (USA) vs [2] Iga Swiatek (POL) Not Before 4:00 PM ATP - [5] Jack Draper (GBR) vs [11] Tommy Paul (USA) Not Before 8:00 PM WTA - [1] Aryna Sabalenka or Peyton Stearns (USA) vs [24] Marta Kostyuk (UKR) or Anastasia Potapova Not Before 9:30 PM ATP - [6] Alex de Minaur (AUS) vs [10] Lorenzo Musetti (ITA) Arantxa Sanchez Stadium - start 1:00 PM ATP - [16] Frances Tiafoe (USA) vs Matteo Arnaldi (ITA) Not Before 3:00 PM WTA - [7] Mirra Andreeva vs [4] Coco Gauff (USA) WTA - Moyuka Uchijima (JPN) or [21] Ekaterina Alexandrova vs [17] Elina Svitolina (UKR) Not Before 7:30 PM ATP - [15] Grigor Dimitrov (BUL) vs [LL] Gabriel Diallo (CAN) Stadium 3 - start 1:00 PM ATP - Alexander Erler (AUT) / Constantin Frantzen (GER) vs [2] Harri Heliovaara (FIN) / Henry Patten (GBR) ATP - [1] Marcelo Arevalo (ESA) / Mate Pavic (CRO) vs Jamie Murray (GBR) / Rajeev Ram (USA) ATP - Joe Salisbury (GBR) / Neal Skupski (GBR) vs Christian Harrison (USA) / Evan King (USA) ATP - [Alt] Fernando Romboli (BRA) / John-Patrick Smith (AUS) or Maximo Gonzalez (ARG) / Andres Molteni (ARG) vs Rohan Bopanna (IND) / Ben Shelton (USA) or [8] Nathaniel Lammons (USA) / Jackson Withrow (USA) Court 5 - start 1:00 PM WTA - [3] Su-Wei Hsieh (TPE) / Jelena Ostapenko (LAT) vs Beatriz Haddad Maia (BRA) / Laura Siegemund (GER) WTA - Sorana Cirstea (ROU) / Anna Kalinskaya vs Linda Noskova (CZE) / Clara Tauson (DEN) ATP - Andre Goransson (SWE) / Sem Verbeek (NED) or Jakub Mensik (CZE) / Adam Pavlasek (CZE) vs [WC] Romain Arneodo (MON) / Manuel Guinard (FRA) or [3] Kevin Krawietz (GER) / Tim Puetz (GER) [NEWSLETTER FORM]

title: Madrid Open 2025 Day 7 Recap
description: The Mutua Madrid Open come back to life on Tuesday after a city-wide power outage in Madrid, triggered by a “substation overload”, left the Caja Mágica without electricity for nearly 24 hours. With power restored, Day 7 delivered a packed schedule of Round of 32 and Round of 16 matches at the Caja Mágica. Key …
author: Jonathan

title: Madrid Open 2025 Day 6 Recap
description: On April 28, 2025, a nationwide power outage across Spain and Portugal brought the Madrid Open to a standstill at the Caja Mágica. The blackout disrupted critical systems, including electronic line-calling, scoreboards, and overhead cameras, forcing a suspension of play. After waiting nearly four hours, tournament organisers finally cancelled the remaining day session matches and …
author: Jonathan
